alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 07 at 11:57AM PST until November 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches with local amounts up to 20 inches. Highest amounts above 7000 feet. Less than 3 inches expected below 6000 ft and little or no accumulation below 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph, especially on the mountain peaks. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
